name: jsCookies
body:
Usage ========= Download 'jsCookies.js', and put this in the <head> of your code: `` Get Cookie Value ========= `getCookie("name");` Create Cookie & Set Value ========= `setCookie("name","value",365);`
nameName of the cookie
valueValue of the cookie
365Number of days till cookie expires
Delete Cookie ========= `eraseCookie("name");`
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
